name: Digits of powers of 2.
comment: The number 0.a(0)a(1)a(2)...=0.124816... is a rich (or disjunctive) number. - _Robert FERREOL_, Apr 01 2020
reference: David Gale, Tracking the Automatic ANT And Other Mathematical Explorations, 1998, pp. 42-43.
N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
link: N. J. A. Sloane, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..9999
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_; entry revised by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 10 2012
